channel.title: Anyone who knows anything about clients HELP ME!(Mopar CM's and Mods too!)
channel.description:
I just downloaded a client and every time I hit run.bat I get this error.
[code]'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Anyone who knows anything about clients HELP ME!(Mopar CM's and Mods too!)
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Can you think of anything?? I got all the latest java stuff I think.

Can you think of anything else I need?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 10:53:36 PM[/size][hr]Or can you think of anything that would be wrong?

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Anyone who knows anything about clients HELP ME!(Mopar CM's and Mods too!)
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Use this:

@echo off
color 0c
title Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac" *.java
pause

Read full topic
